Package br.com.doublelogic.sportschallengebackend.fansservice.persistance.repositories

Interface FanCampaignRepository

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<FanCampaign,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<FanCampaign,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<FanCampaign,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<FanCampaign>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<FanCampaign,Long>

    @Repository
public interface FanCampaignRepository
extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<FanCampaign,Long>
    Componente resposável por fornecer o acesso e atualização das informações salvas no banco para a entidade FanCampaign
    Author:
    Diego

    • Method Detail

      • findCampaignsByFanId

        @Query("select c from FanCampaign fc inner join fc.campaign c where fc.fan.id = :idFan")
List<Campaign> findCampaignsByFanId​(@Param("idFan")
                                    Long idFan)
        Busca todas as campanhas salvas de que o fã participa
        Parameters:
        idFan - identificação do fã
        Returns:
        uma lista com as informações das campanhas

@Query("delete from FanCampaign fc where fc.campaign.id = :idCampaign")
